title: The Heart of a Monkey
description: A friendly monkey finds herself in danger when she trusts a shark. Before she is eaten, she must find a way to outsmart the shark and return safely to her fruit tree. Colorful illustrations and an engaging story will keep readers interested in reading more in The Heart of a Monkey. This book can be used to teach students how to determine cause and effect and to recognize past-tense verbs in writing.
reviewWords: cure, journey, scrambled, sultan, survive, trick
comprehension: Cause and Effect                : Determine cause-and-effect relationships
awareness: Short Vowel Sounds                : Discriminate short vowel /i/ sound
phonics: Short Vowels : Identify and use short vowel i
